executedFeatures: exception handler should handle the HttpMediaTypeNotSupportedException and send the ErrorResponseDto with the error message
exception handler should handle the MethodArgumentNotValidException and send the ErrorResponseDto with the error message
exception handler should handle the MissingInputException and send the ErrorResponseDto with the error message
exception handler should handle the NotFoundException and send the ErrorResponseDto with the error message
diff API should call the service to compare the left and right inputs of the given diffId
saveLeft API should save the left input of a Diff
saveRight API should save the right input of a Diff
diff should compare the left and right inputs and return the diff results
diff should compare the left and right inputs and return the result type
diff should throw MissingInputException if any input is missing
findById should return the Diff if the diffId is found
findById should throw NotFoundException if the diffId does not exists
if the diffId already exists the Diff input should be updated accordingly with the input type
non existing diffId should be saved in the repository

Base64Dto mapping to right input of Diff

null mapping to DiffDto
